The reviewer, initially skeptical of the price, ultimately declared it the best tuna she had ever tasted, highlighting its superior quality compared to cheaper alternatives like Prince's Tuna.

articles.title: Avalange Bridging Gap Between Traditional Fashion Brands & Customizable Apparel - and Winning Over Gen Z
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Avalange is introducing designer-quality t-shirts with customizable premium designs. The brand aims to empower individuality through bold graphics and premium fabrics, targeting Gen Z with clothes that emphasize self-expression.

articles.title: TCL's new smartphone uses the latest version of its eye-comfort screen tech
articles.author: Will Shanklin
articles.summary: TCL is launching its new NXTPAPER 60 Ultra phone, featuring the latest NXTPAPER 4.0 eye-comfort screen technology, which balances e-paper and OLED screens. The mid-range Android phone has a 7.2-inch 120Hz display, MediaTek Dimensity 7400 processor, 12GB of RAM, a 50MP periscope telephoto camera, and a 5,200 mAh battery. The NXTPAPER 60 Ultra will be available in Europe, Latin America, and Asian markets later this month, priced at €499 for 256GB and €549 for 512GB.

articles.title: TCL gives parents a monochrome mode to combat kids' phone addiction
articles.author: Dominic Preston
articles.summary: TCL is launching the Nxtpaper 5G Junior, a kids' phone with a focus on eye health and screentime management, in Europe in December. TCL is also launching the Nxtpaper 60 Ultra, featuring the latest Nxtpaper 4.0 tech, in Europe, Asia, and Latin America.

articles.title: MotionPoint Launches AI-Powered Transcreation for Global Marketing Teams
articles.author: Motion Point
articles.summary: MotionPoint launched its new AI-powered transcreation technology on September 4, 2025. This self-serve solution uses AI to help global marketing teams adapt marketing assets for specific markets with cultural context.

articles.title: TCL Introduces the TCL NXTPAPER 60 Ultra Smartphone, Combining Ultimate Eye-Comfort with Exceptional All-round Performance
articles.author: TCL Mobile
articles.summary: TCL launched the TCL NXTPAPER 60 Ultra smartphone at IFA 2025, featuring the new NXTPAPER 4.0 technology developed with TCL CSOT. This smartphone boasts a 7.2-inch display and includes seven eye-care technologies, along with AI-powered reading and writing and MuseFilm imaging technology.

articles.title: I tried 8 high-protein pastas, and my favorite contained cauliflower and parsnips
articles.summary: The article reviews various protein pasta brands, including Banza, Barilla, Ancient Harvest, Simple Truth Organic, Pasta Lensi, Target's Good & Gather, and Cybele's Free to Eat, assessing their taste, texture, and protein content. Cybele's green-lentil pasta, featuring cauliflower and parsnip, received the top pick for its neutral flavor and ideal al-dente texture, while Good & Gather's red-lentil rotini was highlighted as a cost-effective alternative to Pasta Lensi.

articles.title: I tried 8 high-protein pastas, and my favorite contained cauliflower and parsnips
articles.author: Su-Jit Lin
articles.summary: Cybele's Free to Eat launched green-lentil pasta with cauliflower and parsnip, noted for its mild flavor and good texture. Good & Gather's red-lentil rotini offers similar quality to Pasta Lensi at a lower price. Barilla chickpea pasta provides a creamy experience surpassing Banza in flavor.

articles.title: BizCard Introduces AI-Powered Digital Business Card to Transform Networking
articles.summary: BizCard launched its new AI-powered digital business card platform, designed to enhance professional networking and lead generation. The platform includes features such as Call My Agent for call management, AI Presenter for dynamic presentations, and Meeting for automated meeting transcripts. This new platform is available as both a web and mobile application.

articles.title: Testing Pro Res Zoom on the Google Pixel 10 Pro: does it live up to the hype?
articles.summary: Google launched the Google Pixel 10 series featuring 'Pro Res Zoom,' which utilizes generative AI to enhance image quality when zooming. The Pixel 10 offers Pro Res Zoom up to 20x, while the 10 Pro and 10 Pro XL allow up to 100x. Testing shows that the feature's performance varies, with better results at lower zoom levels.

articles.title: Nvidia's RTX 5080 upgrade for GeForce Now arrives on September 10th
articles.author: Tom Warren
articles.summary: Nvidia will upgrade its GeForce Now cloud gaming service to RTX 5080 GPUs on September 10th. The upgrade will support 5K resolutions at 60fps and 120fps, or 1440p at 240fps and 1080p at 360fps and include a new 'Install-to-Play' feature to improve the GeForce Now library. It will cost $19.99 a month for GeForce Now Ultimate.

articles.title: UNBUTTER EXPANDS TO HEALTHY PLANET ONTARIO LOCATIONS
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: UnButter, operating under the HotSourSaltySweet brand, has launched a new shea butter-based plant-based butter alternative. This product is positioned as a disruptor in the plant-based category and is the first of its kind in North America, offering a high-fat, allergen-free option.

articles.title: Eskimi pioneers AI-powered contextual advertising with DeepContext
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Eskimi has launched DeepContext, an AI-powered solution designed to enhance contextual advertising strategies for advertisers. DeepContext evaluates website content, supports multiple languages, and allows brands to define custom blueprints for ad placements, ensuring relevance and brand safety.

articles.title: Designli Unveils New Manifesto to Guide SaaS Founders in Building Scalable Digital Products
articles.author: Newsfile
articles.summary: Designli has released its new manifesto, which describes the company's vision for partnering with non-technical founders to develop and launch startup ideas into sustainable businesses. This manifesto highlights Designli's commitment to bridging the technical gap for early-stage founders and ensuring their ideas translate into market-ready solutions through product strategy, agile development, and usability.

articles.title: Samsung launches Galaxy Tab S11 Ultra and Tab S11 with S Pen support
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy Tab S11 series on September 4, 2025, introducing two new tablets: the Galaxy Tab S11 Ultra and the Galaxy Tab S11. The Galaxy Tab S11 Ultra features a 14.6-inch display with 1,600 nits brightness and a 120 Hz refresh rate, while the Tab S11 has an 11-inch display.

articles.title: Samsung Unveils Galaxy S25 FE and Tab S11 Series at September Galaxy Event
articles.author: Aminu Abdullahi
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy S25 FE, featuring a 6.7-inch display, advanced AI tools, and an improved camera system, starting at $649. The company also introduced the Galaxy Tab S11 series, including the Tab S11 Ultra with a 14.6-inch display and enhanced S Pen, with prices starting at $799 and $1,199, respectively.

articles.title: NEW CIRCULON INFINITY PAN WITH SCRATCHDEFENSE™
articles.author: Meyer Corporation U.S
articles.summary: Circulon has launched the Circulon Infinity Pan with ScratchDefense ™, a versatile, all-in-one pan designed for simplifying cooking routines. The pan is available for $139.99 at www.Circulon.com and Amazon.com.

articles.title: MNML Fine-Tunes Assortment for Revenue Boost with Centric PLM
articles.author: Centric Software
articles.summary: MNML, a fashion and lifestyle brand, has implemented Centric PLM™ from Centric Software to improve the creation, tracking, and delivery of seasonal collections. Centric Software provides enterprise solutions for various industries to help achieve digital transformation goals.

articles.title: Designli Unveils New Manifesto to Guide SaaS Founders in Building Scalable Digital Products
articles.author: Newsfile
articles.summary: Designli, a software development agency, has released a new company manifesto. The manifesto outlines the agency's philosophy for building software that empowers SaaS and startup founders to launch, validate, and scale their businesses.

articles.title: 29 Inexpensive 'Shark Tank' Products You'll Use All Year
articles.author: Danielle Healy
articles.summary: The content highlights several new product offerings spanning various categories.  These include innovations like Scrub Daddy's temperature-controlled scrubbers, reusable Stasher food bags, and convenient solutions like a gift wrap cutter and a car gap filler. Many of these products were featured on Shark Tank and aim to solve everyday problems.

articles.title: Supersonik Raises $5 Million From Andreessen Horowitz For AI Sales Agent
articles.author: Charlie Fink
articles.summary: Supersonik has launched an AI agent service that delivers live, multilingual software demos on demand. This service aims to provide prospective buyers with instant access to personalized product demonstrations, eliminating the need for waitlists or scheduled demos. The company received $5 million seed funding led by Andreessen Horowitz and plans to expand in the U.S.

articles.title: 7 Target Beauty Bargains a Shopping Insider Always Buys — Best Life
articles.author: Leah Barrett
articles.summary: Almay has updated the formula of its Clear Complexion Concealer to include prebiotics and aloe. Several beauty and body care products sold at Target, including Monday Moisture Shampoo and Conditioner, Saltair Santal Bloom Body Wash, Bio-Oil Skincare Oil, e.l.f. Halo Glow Liquid Filter Highlighter, and Tree Hut Body Scrub are also mentioned as favorites.

articles.title: Ask Aria Is Live: Realbotix Lets You Chat with a Hyperrealistic AI Companion
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Amazon has launched a new feature called Lens Live. This feature allows users to scan items around them using their smartphone camera. With the help of artificial intelligence, Amazon enables users to instantly shop for scanned items on its platform.

articles.title: Samsung just launched new flagship Galaxy tablets - and quietly removed this model
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Samsung has released the Tab S11 Ultra and Tab S11 tablets, with prices beginning at $800.

articles.title: How To Get ChatGPT To Recommend Your Products First: A Step-By-Step Guide
articles.author: Tasneem Kanchwala
articles.summary: OpenAI introduced a new feature that allows merchants to showcase their products in ChatGPT search results. ChatGPT can now recommend products based on user queries, offering organic placement opportunities for businesses. OpenAI is also developing a system for merchants to submit product feeds directly to ChatGPT for more accurate and up-to-date listings.

articles.title: From Lululemon To Drunk Elephant: 32 Alternatives To Pricey Brand-Name Items That Are So Good, You May Say "Buh-Bye" To The Originals
articles.author: Curtis Teegardin
articles.summary: E.l.f. launched Halo Glow Liquid Filter, which makes the skin glow and blurs pores similar to Charlotte Tilbury's Flawless Filter. NYX provides matte setting spray with no scent with better spritzer compared to Urban Decay. Peach Slices offers acne spot dots, providing hydrocolloid patches which are similar to Hero's Mighty Patches.

articles.title: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander Launches Converse SHAI 001 Sneakers for Public Sale Today
articles.author: Internewscast
articles.summary: Converse is launching the SHAI 001, Shai Gilgeous-Alexander's first signature sneaker, in the 'BUTTER' colorway. The sneaker will be available in limited quantities via Nike SNKRS, Converse US, and in-store at select Undefeated and Kith locations and is designed for versatility on and off the court. Kith will also host a special event at its Toronto flagship store to celebrate the launch.

articles.title: Hollow Knight Silksong premieres today with new protagonist and mysterious kingdom to explore
articles.author: Redação Mix Vale
articles.summary: Team Cherry's game, Hollow Knight: Silksong, launches on September 4th on PC, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch, Xbox One, and Xbox Series. Subscribers can access it via Xbox Game Pass and PC Game Pass. The game features a new quest system, hand-drawn scenarios, and new abilities.

articles.title: Tecno Pova Slim launched, brings thin design and 5160mAh battery for Rs 19,999
articles.author: India Today
articles.summary: Tecno has launched the Pova Slim, a new smartphone featuring a thin design and a mAh battery. The device is priced at Rs.

articles.title: Samsung launches Galaxy S25 FE and upgrades tablets
articles.summary: Samsung introduced the Galaxy S25 FE smartphone, offering Galaxy AI features at a more accessible price. Concurrently, Samsung launched the Galaxy Tab S11 series, reshaping its tablet offerings. The Galaxy S25 FE integrates multimodal AI via One UI 8, enhancing user interaction through voice, text, images, and visual cues, secured by Knox Enhanced Encrypted Protection.

articles.title: Nikon Introduces Silver Version Of Z f Mirrorless Camera
articles.author: BW Online Bureau
articles.summary: Nikon India has introduced a new silver version of the Nikon Z f mirrorless camera, expanding its line-up with additional customisation options. Six new Premium Exterior color options have been made available, allowing users to further customise their camera bodies. Nikon also announced that the Z f will support a new Film Grain feature, to be introduced via a future firmware update scheduled in 2025.

articles.title: Western Digital Introduces WD Blue SN5100 NVMe SSD In India
articles.author: BW Online Bureau
articles.summary: Western Digital has launched the WD Blue SN5100 NVMe SSD in India, targeting users involved in AI, productivity, and video editing. The SSD offers improved performance with read speeds up to 7,100 MB/s and capacities ranging from 500GB to 4TB, starting at Rs 3,999 for the 500GB model.

articles.title: How Dartthe 'secret sauce' to a Google toolkithelping developers achieve their 'wildest dreams'became one of the fastest growing programming languages (GOOG, GOOGL, EBAY, GRPN)
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: Google launched Dart and Flutter, programming tools used by companies such as eBay and Groupon to develop mobile applications. eBay utilized Flutter to build its Motors app, while Groupon adopted Dart to enhance its tools for merchants. These technologies provide benefits such as rapid development cycles and ease of use, leading to their increasing adoption in the industry.

articles.title: Terry's Chocolate has unveiled its mystery flavour – here's where to buy it
articles.author: Lois Borny
articles.summary: Terry's Chocolate Orange has launched a new flavor, the Terry's Chocolate Orange caramel ball, as part of its Christmas line-up. The caramel ball features the brand's signature milk chocolate with a caramel twist, housed in gold packaging and is described as being very sweet. It is currently available at Co-op, Morrisons, Lidl, Ocado, and Sainsburys, and is coming soon to Tesco and Asda stores.

articles.title: IFF's Designed Enzymatic Biomaterials™ Platform Sees First Large-Scale Use in Home Care Applications
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: IFF announced the first large-scale commercial use of its Designed Enzymatic Biomaterials™ (DEB) platform. A major consumer packaged goods (CPG) company launched a new laundry detergent formulation enhanced by DEB technology, delivering improved fabric softness and cleaning performance while replacing non-biodegradable ingredients. The Lyrature™ portfolio with DEB-based products will replace persistent, non-biodegradable ingredients such as polyquaterniums in laundry formulations.

articles.title: Giacomo Bruno Unveils 'Error-Free AI Launch' Book: The Launch Mistakes Behind ChatGPT5 and a 30-Day Prelaunch Strategy for GPT6 and GROK5
articles.author: Bruno Editore
articles.summary: Giacomo Bruno has launched a new book titled 'Error-Free AI Launch: The 30-Day Prelaunch Method for CEOs Who Want to Turn Every Release into a Global Success'. The book is a hands-on operational manual for leaders who want to navigate the complex AI market with confidence. The book is available on Amazon worldwide.

articles.title: 51 Items For A Clean And Organized Home
articles.author: Maitland Quitmeyer
articles.summary: This content introduces a wide range of new cleaning and organizing products from various companies. These include the Levoit air purifier with smart features, Scrub Daddy sponges and holders, Dawn Powerwash dish soap, Rubbermaid Brilliance containers, Tineco cordless vacuum and mop, Shark Steam & Scrub steam mop, Rocco & Roxie's odor-eliminating spray, The Pink Stuff cleaning product, Wet & Forget cleaner, Bar Keepers Friend soft cleanser, Method hardwood floor cleaner, Sprayway glass cleaner, Bissell CleanView bagless vacuum, Cerama-Bryte cooktop cleaning kit, and Chomp! stain remover, each designed for specific cleaning tasks around the home. Also, there are products for organizing spaces, like the Honeycomb drawer insert, glass jars with bamboo lids, beauty organizers, spice and pantry labels, shoe slotz, shelf dividers and more.

articles.title: IFF's Designed Enzymatic Biomaterials™ Platform Sees First Large-Scale Use in Home Care Applications
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: IFF's Designed Enzymatic Biomaterials™ (DEB) platform is being used commercially for the first time. A major consumer packaged goods (CPG) company launched a new laundry detergent formulation enhanced by IFF's DEB technology. The new formulation offers improved fabric softening and cleaning while using biodegradable ingredients.

articles.title: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander's Converse SHAI 001 Shoe Releases To Public Today
articles.author: Nick Crain
articles.summary: Converse is launching the SHAI 001, Shai Gilgeous-Alexander's first signature sneaker, in the 'BUTTER' colorway for $130. The SHAI 001 is available at Nike SNKRS, Converse US, and select Kith and Undefeated stores. The sneaker is designed for versatility, customization, and self-expression.

articles.title: Lidl's gadget dries 2 loads of washing in a couple of hours & it's £20 cheaper than on Amazon
articles.author: Aiya Zhussupova
articles.summary: Lidl is launching the Minky heated airer in its stores starting September 11, priced at £39.99. Lidl also introduces the Monsieur Cuisine Smart, a Thermomix dupe, and offers discounts on kitchen appliances. Additionally, Lidl provides exclusive savings and perks to Lidl Plus members, enhancing their service offerings.

articles.title: Sully's Steamers offers unique and cleverly-name sandwiches on Marietta Square
articles.author: Mark Woolsey
articles.summary: Sully's Steamers has opened its first metro Atlanta location in Marietta Square. The restaurant is known for its unique steamed bagel sandwiches with various breakfast and lunch options like the 'meat chimney' and 'Griswold'. The Balas family co-owns the franchise, bringing Sully's Steamers' 'hot mess' sandwiches to the Atlanta community.

articles.title: Unbreakable Agreement: Compact & Reliable Solutions
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: The Sony ZV-1A camera is empowering a new wave of 'prosumer' video creators by offering professional-quality results without the professional price tag or complexity. With features like a compact size, discreet design, dedicated capture grip, and improved audio, the ZV-1A has become a favorite, especially among vloggers, and delivers impressive image quality, making it suitable for marketers and small businesses.

articles.title: I have a big problem with Spotify's new messaging feature — here's why
articles.author: Tammy Rogers
articles.summary: Spotify has launched a new messaging feature integrated within its app, allowing users to share albums, tracks, and playlists with other Spotify users. The feature, accessible through the profile picture, is being rolled out globally to users aged 16 and above and requires permission to receive messages. However, the new messaging feature doesn't support GIFs.

articles.title: Lazada Launches 9.9 Mega Brands Sale with Exciting Deals and Guilt-Free Shopping Experience
articles.author: Lazada
articles.summary: Lazada is launching its 9.9 sale, featuring 'Crazy Brand Mega Offers' with discounts up to 90% and storewide vouchers on LazMall. The event includes RM19 All Out Deals from over 30 brands and the introduction of LazMall Surprise Boxes for RM9. It also offers a curated list of items called Mesti Beli and allows securing deals in advance with 9.9 Chup Dulu.

articles.title: Roborock is "Rocking Life, Inside and Out" at IFA 2025 with first launch of RockMow and RockNeo lawnmower series
articles.summary: Roborock introduces several new products, including the RockMow and RockNeo robotic lawnmowers, the Qrevo Curv 2 Pro robot vacuum with powerful suction and AdaptiLift Chassis, and the F25 Ultra wet-dry vacuum cleaner featuring VaporFlow high-temperature cleaning. Also launching are the H60 series of stick vacuum cleaners with an auto-empty dock and the Zeo X washer-dryer with Zeo-cycle drying technology. Availability and pricing vary across the European Union and the US.

articles.title: XLM News: Buy StellarPad AI (on Stellar Lumens) Utility Token $SLP At a Discount Price
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: StellarPad AI has launched its native utility token, $SLP, through a presale. StellarPad AI is a new decentralized, AI-powered launchpad on the Stellar blockchain, offering services such as secure token creation, presale management, and community scaling. Holding $SLP provides access to AI-vetted launches and staking.

articles.title: Roborock reveals new robot vacuum, lawn mowers, and more at IFA 2025
articles.author: Jon Bitner
articles.summary: Roborock introduced a new lineup of products at IFA 2025. The new products include a new robot vacuum, an updated wet-dry vacuum, smart washer and dryer, and three robot lawn mowers. One of the products is named Roborock Qrevo Curv.

articles.title: Eskimi launches DeepContext in Romania
articles.author: Romania Journal
articles.summary: Eskimi, a global creative and media technology platform, has launched DeepContext, an AI-powered solution for contextual advertising. This tool assists advertisers in building client-specific brand strategies by understanding content meaning, offering real-time website monitoring, and supporting nearly all world languages, allowing for advanced contextual targeting.

articles.title: Galaxy S25 FE, Tab S11, And Buds3 FE: AI Gets Cheaper, Tablets Get Thinner, Audio Gets Smarter
articles.author: Fernando Fong
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy S25 FE smartphone, Tab S11 series tablets, and Galaxy Buds3 FE earbuds, all featuring AI integration. The Galaxy S25 FE starts at RM3,099, the Tab S11 series ranges from RM3,899 to RM6,999, and the Galaxy Buds3 FE are priced at RM499. These devices will be available in Malaysia on September 19 and aim to offer more affordable access to Samsung's AI-powered ecosystem.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Tab S11 Ultra hands on: still the biggest tablet
articles.author: Nirave Gondhia
articles.summary: Samsung announced the Galaxy Tab S11 series in Berlin. This new tablet series is the follow-up to the Galaxy Tab S10 series. The announcement occurred alongside the new Galaxy S25 FE.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 FE launched at $650: Check features
articles.summary: Samsung has officially unveiled the Galaxy S25 Fan Edition (FE), a more affordable version of its flagship Galaxy S25 series, priced at $649.99 for the base model with 128GB storage. The device features a 6.7-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X display with a refresh rate of up to 120Hz, runs on One UI 8, is powered by the Exynos 2400 4nm processor, and comes with a 4,900mAh battery and a triple-camera array with a 50MP main lens.

articles.title: Newsom shows how to lose businesses and insult entrepreneurs
articles.summary: Bed Bath & Beyond plans to debut hundreds of new physical locations after emerging from bankruptcy. However, the company will not open stores in California due to the state's overregulated and expensive business environment.

articles.title: Huawei's second trifold adds stylus support and purple pleather
articles.author: Dominic Preston
articles.summary: Huawei has launched the Mate XTs, its second-generation trifold phone, featuring stylus support, a Kirin 9020 chipset, an improved 40-megapixel ultrawide camera, and new colors. Alongside the XTs, Huawei announced the MatePad Mini tablet, Freebuds 7i earbuds, and a MateTV range.

articles.title: Netcracker Advances Agentic AI for Telecom With a Focus on Scale, Openness and Measurable Business Impact
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Netcracker Technology has introduced an evolution of its Agentic AI Solution for telecom, featuring ready-to-deploy telecom AI Agents, an enhanced open Agentic AI Platform, and AI-native integration across its digital IT portfolio. This update provides telecom service providers a faster route to scaling AI across their business by automating workflows and accelerating innovation, aiming to build trust in AI-driven operations.

articles.title: Roborock's Curv 2 Pro can drop its mop pads to keep your carpets dry
articles.author: Emma Roth
articles.summary: Roborock is launching the Qrevo Curv 2 Pro robot vacuum in the European Union. The new model features 25,000 Pa of suction, a dual-spinning mop system, AI-powered obstacle recognition, and a slimmer design. The Qrevo Curv 2 Pro is available for €1299 (~$1,514).

articles.title: Roborock graduates from vacuuming your house to mowing your lawn
articles.author: Emma Roth
articles.summary: Roborock is launching three new robot lawnmowers: RockMow Z1, RockMow S1, and RockNeo Q1. The RockMow Z1 features all-wheel drive and independent steering, while the RockMow S1 offers AI-powered smart mapping. The RockNeo Q1 is designed for everyday maintenance with a wildlife-friendly feature.

articles.title: Roborock makes one of my favourite robot vacs, and now it wants to look after your garden as well
articles.author: Connor Jewiss
articles.summary: Roborock has announced the RockMow Series, its first robot lawnmowers for Europe, featuring three models: Z1, S1, and Q1, designed for varying garden sizes and needs. Acer showcased its latest Copilot+ PCs, AI laptops, and gaming portables at its IFA 2025 press conference.

articles.title: Roborock is "Rocking Life, Inside and Out" at IFA 2025 with first launch of RockMow and RockNeo lawnmower series
articles.summary: Roborock is launching several new products and services, including the RockMow and RockNeo series of lawnmowers, the Roborock Qrevo Curv 2 Pro RVC, the Roborock F25 Ultra wet-dry vacuum, the Roborock H60 & H60 Hub Series of stick vacuums, and the Roborock Zeo X washer-dryer. Additionally, ZTE and MTN have commercially deployed the world's first 5-band Remote Radio Unit (RRU) in South Africa.

articles.title: DePIN startup GAIA opens pre-sale for Galaxy S25 Edge AI smartphone
articles.author: BTC Manager
articles.summary: GAIA, a decentralized AI startup, has initiated a limited pre-sale for an AI product.

articles.title: Crafting Viral Video Success in One Sentence with AI: Insights from Geek Park's Latest Launch
articles.author: Marina Collins
articles.summary: Xiaohuanli, an AI platform, is currently in public beta and offers scriptwriting, video editing, image generation, and digital human capabilities.  It has a subscription price of $79 per month or $759 annually, which provides access to 1200 content points per month.

articles.title: I got my hands on the Samsung Galaxy S25 FE: Classic design isn't the only highlight
articles.author: Anuj Bhatia
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy S25 FE, a premium mid-range smartphone joining the S25 series, starting at $650 internationally. The phone features a 6.7-inch AMOLED display, Exynos 2400 chip, a 50MP primary camera, and runs One UI 8 based on Android 16, and it is supported with software and security updates for seven years. It offers key features of the S25 line at a more accessible price point.

articles.title: 华为发布首款MateTV，售价8999元起；华为第二代三折叠手机17999元起；华为MatePad Mini3999元起_手机网易网

org: 华为正式发布智慧屏新产品
articles.summary: Huawei launched several new products on September 4th, including the Huawei MateTV smart screen starting at 8999 yuan, featuring a flagship phone-grade chip and HarmonyOS 5. The company also launched the Mate XTs extraordinary master folding phone, starting at 17999 yuan. Furthermore, Huawei unveiled the MatePad Mini tablet, featuring an 8.8-inch flexible OLED screen and starting at 3999 yuan.

articles.title: Robot vacuum that can climb the stairs? All the Anker products announced at IFA
articles.summary: Anker Innovations, along with its brands Eufy and Soundcore, unveiled several new products at IFA 2025. These include the EufyMake E1 UV Printer, the Eufy Robot Vacuum Omni S2 with stair-climbing carrier Marswalker, Eufy Security AI Core and EufyCam S4, Soundcore Sleep A30 earbuds and AI Voice Recorder, Soundcore Nebula X1 Pro projector, new Anker Prime chargers, and Anker Solix Solarbank Multisystem and V1 Smart EV Charger. These products feature innovative technologies like AI, robotics, and advanced charging capabilities.

articles.title: Lisa Snowdon praises £26 buy for keeping her hair clean and voluminous after 18 hours of travel
articles.author: Grace Salmon
articles.summary: Living Proof has launched Perfect Hair Day Advanced Clean Dry Shampoo, a product recommended by TV presenter Lisa Snowdon for refreshing hair after travel. The dry shampoo cleans hair by absorbing sweat and grease while adding volume. A travel mini version is available for £15.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 update just made owning a Samsung phone far more affordable
articles.author: Dave Snelling
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy S25 FE, a new smartphone model with a 6.7-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X display, triple lens rear camera, and Galaxy AI features. The phone is available from today in various colors and storage options, starting at £649, with trade-in offers and a free Galaxy Watch7.

articles.title: Samsung's Galaxy Tab S11 series could finally make your next iPad purchase a tough decision
articles.author: Mahnoor Faisal
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy Tab S11 series, including the standard S11 and the S11 Ultra, powered by a 3nm processor. The S11 series features the thinnest tablet design, Dynamic AMOLED 2X displays with up to a 120Hz refresh rate, and integrated Galaxy AI features such as Gemini Live. Available in Gray and Silver, the Galaxy Tab S11 starts at $799.99, launching on September 4.

articles.title: Huawei unveils US$2,500 trifold smartphone ahead of Apple's iPhone 17 reveal
articles.summary: Huawei Technologies has launched the Mate XTs, its second trifold smartphone, powered by Kirin 9020 chipset and HarmonyOS. The Mate XTs features three screens extending to a 10.2-inch display and includes the new Huawei M-Pen 3 stylus, with presales starting immediately and deliveries beginning on September 12.

articles.title: Samsung's Galaxy Tab S11 Ultra is here, and it aims to replace your laptop
articles.author: Jay Bonggolto
articles.summary: Samsung has released the Galaxy Tab S11 and Galaxy Tab S11 Ultra tablets, featuring new AI tools via One UI 8, enhanced Samsung DeX capabilities, and a redesigned S Pen. The tablets are available starting September 4, with the Tab S11 priced from $800 and the Tab S11 Ultra from $1,200.

articles.title: Save $50 on the OnePlus Pad 3 and get a free stylus pen - here's ...
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: OnePlus offers a free Stylo 2 pen or Folio Case with the purchase of their latest flagship Android tablet.

articles.title: AI Publishing Revolution: Transforming Content Creation and Discovery in the Digital Age
articles.author: Daniel Foster
articles.summary: Taboola launched 'DeeperDive,' an AI-powered answer engine embedded on publisher websites, which utilizes the publisher's own data to generate responses and directs users to other relevant content. Politico launched an AI tool for its Pro subscribers designed to streamline the creation of policy reports.
